name: TERAPIFY NETWORK S.A.P.I. DE C.V
description: Operator of an online therapy platform intended for the Spanish-speaking market. The company's platform offers online psychotherapy sessions attended by clinical psychologists who provide counseling on topics that include anxiety, stress, depression, couple problems, self-esteem issues, personal development and sexuality, enabling users to connect with psychologists online to regain and maintain their emotional stability.
